channel.title: Spawn with custom items?
channel.description:
well, i want my characters be spawned in the beginning with only full rune..
how do i fix this????
thx again :D

item.title: Spawn with custom items?
item.dc:creator: @fedexer -fedexer-
item.description:
@fedexer wrote:

dj, what you need to do is go into player.java

look for this

//Giving the player an unique look

then below it you will see code resembeling this :

//playerEquipment[playerHat]= ; playerEquipment[playerCape]= 6959; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]= 6041; playerEquipment[playerChest]= 2615; playerEquipment[playerShield]= 2621; /*playerEquipment[playerLegs]= 1079; playerEquipment[playerHands]=Item.randomGloves(); playerEquipment[playerFeet]=Item.randomBoots(); playerEquipment[playerRing]=Item.randomRing(); playerEquipment[playerArrows]=Item.randomArrows();*/ playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=1275;

all you do is change the items for the id’s you want…

and if you have “Item.randomArrows();” etc… then just remove and replace it with a id

i hope that helps ya out

Read full topic
